title: Over 80,000 Microsoft Entra ID Accounts Targeted Using Open-Source TeamFiltration Tool
summary:
Cybersecurity researchers have uncovered a new account takeover (ATO) campaign that leverages an open-source penetration testing framework called TeamFiltration to breach Microsoft Entra ID (formerly Azure Active Directory) user accounts.
The activity, codenamed UNK_SneakyStrike by Proofpoint, has a

title: ChatGPT o3 API 80% price drop has no impact on performance
summary: ChatGPT o3, which has been available via API, is now 80% cheaper for developers, and there's no visible impact on performance. [...]

title: SmartAttack uses smartwatches to steal data from air-gapped systems
summary: A new attack dubbed 'SmartAttack' uses smartwatches as a covert ultrasonic signal receiver to exfiltrate data from physically isolated (air-gapped) systems. [...]

title: Erie Insurance confirms cyberattack behind business disruptions
summary: Erie Insurance and Erie Indemnity Company have disclosed that a weekend cyberattack is behind the recent business disruptions and platform outages on its website. [...]
